extracted_data.point: Pain management during labor includes a range of options, from natural methods to pharmacological and regional anesthesia, with patient autonomy in decision-making.

The doctor will explain all pain management options and risks individually.
The patient and doctor jointly decide which interventions to use.

extracted_data.point: Labor can be induced or augmented with medications such as oxytocin, which may be used for various indications including insufficient contractions, preterm labor, or to delay labor for surgical reasons.

extracted_data.point: Delivery methods are individualized, with a preference for vaginal delivery and avoidance of episiotomy unless medically indicated, though episiotomy may be performed to prevent severe tearing.
